entry.title: Dear Daddy Long Legs
entry.summary:
Author: AthenaGC94

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 52,552Chapters: 20/30Kudos: 503

Summary: “I’m looking for an application for a scholarship.”“You didn’t have to hack our systems to apply for a scholarship,” Tim deadpanned, “I wasn’t aware you could go to college if you’re legally dead.”His eye twitched. “I’m looking for an applicant,” he amended, “She already applied.”Tim finally looked at him. “She?”_____Inspired by the novel Daddy Long Legs by Jean Webster. Jason Todd saves you from getting mugged one night and ends up being your mysterious benefactor, funding your college experience. Featuring awkward "zero rizz" Jason Todd and several members of the Bat Family.Jason Todd x Fem!Reader - does not use y/n

entry.title: Like A Campfire At Night (The Smoke Is Blowing In My Eyes)
entry.summary:
Author: SlightlyAce

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,074Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 8

Summary: Jason winced, the blood loss was mixing with the long night and making him sensitive in a way he didn’t want to be around a civilian. Especially not one shrieking at him with a baseball bat.He gripped the handle of your door, just trying to pull himself up, and that seemed to kick you into gear because you yanked the door open, sending him crashing back down to the grated floor of your fire escape, and then started spewing apologies at him as you tried to ask if he was okay. You never wanted to play nurse for one of Gotham's notorious vigilantes. Frankly, you were probably the least capable person to fill that role. You still somehow end up playing doctor for the Red Hood the night he first crash lands on your balcony.[Prequel to Moths To Flames (I'm Sorry For Dimming Them) ]

entry.title: The Star that Wouldn't Die
entry.summary:
Author: ShadDork

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,694Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 29

Summary: Jason Todd forgot a lot of things after the lazarus pit's putrid green waters helped restore him back to life. Most of it was unimportant information, things that he didn't need to worry about, after all, he could always relearn names, smells, and re-read books. Lost memories weren't as easy to deal with the loss of, but he could always make new ones. The memories that remained were largely traumatic, and the others were slowly being uncovered as time passed.He wished that Dick hadn't said that name, your name. Reigniting feelings and memories. Guilt was already a large part of his existence, and this new guilt about forgetting you entirely was just making everything worse. He shouldn't track you down in case it accidentally put you in danger. But he wanted to make sure that you were okay. It was a battle he lost against himself.As memories he thought were long lost start to return, can he continue to be in your life without dragging you down with him? Can he be in your life without you knowing who he is? He doesn't know, but he wants to try.

entry.title: Now That Your Rose Is In Bloom
entry.summary:
Author: transgendertommy

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,875Chapters: 18/?Kudos: 21

Summary: You begin to train with Jason Todd and Bruce Wayne under the mantle of Nightingale, a vigilante you created. When Jason gets caught up in Dick's mess and Hank and Dawn recruit him, you go with. Before you know it you're traveling across the country with your boyfriend and becoming a Titan. It's what you always wanted. What could go wrong?A Jason Todd x reader fic that basically rewrites the entire show to include the reader and the relationship through your eyes.READ AUTHORS NOTE DONT SKIP THAT CHAPTER! I abandoned this then turned it into the crossover. Too lazy to add to tags. Read it first if you're unsure to read the whole thing or not

entry.title: Cracks in the Armor
entry.summary:
Author: arkham_bunniii

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,064Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 40

Summary: You were a former GCPD detective who left the force after Gotham’s corruption pushed you too far. Now, you work in the gray area of Gotham’s underworld—tracking weapons, gathering intel, and occasionally taking down the scum that even the Bat can’t reach.When the Arkham Knight arrives, he doesn’t just tear through Gotham… he takes it over in a single night. Every time you cross paths, it’s the same: a dangerous game of cat and mouse.You’re enemies. You should be enemies. But every fight, every standoff, pulls you closer, and something tells you there’s more to this soldier than the armor he wears.All your begging to ask is, what’s really beneath that helmet?

Author: MisakiIsStupid

Sometimes fate has a strange sense of humor, bringing soulmates together in the most dangerous of circumstances.

entry.title: Moon-Lights Embrace
entry.summary:
Author: Neriumssmut

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,993Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 8

Summary: Jason Todd hears rumors that The Scarecrow has been metaling with a new fear formula that would be able to tap into a person's dream physically. Changing it into whatever he wants and also being able to keep them there in his own personal nightmare playground. Jason knows Batman will only try and take him into custody again once he hears of it and he's had enough of the back and forth with the same villains. Scarecrow wants nothing but death and suffering and that's exactly what he's gonna get.Ayla Rivens, otherwise known as Dusk, a survivor turned avenger, Dusk is a ruthless, dream-walking vigilante with a personal vendetta against Scarecrow. Her powers make her a formidable force, but her methods are as dark as the nightmares she controls.
